text: Plan for a large initial payload when using the streaming SDK.
Feature flags can target specific users or segments using rules.
LaunchDarkly's Relay Proxy can help with performance and caching in enterprise environments.
Avoid flag bloat: remove deprecated flags to keep your codebase clean.
Use flag triggers for real-time behavior changes without redeploying.
Set `trackEvents` to `true` on flags if you want to send event data for experimentation.
